articles.author: Janis Laizans
articles.title: Flood-hit Central Europe fortifies towns as waters and death toll rise - Reuters
articles.description: Volunteers shored up defences to stem swollen rivers in the Polish city of Nysa on Tuesday, one of dozens of towns and cities across central Europe deluged by devastating floods that have killed at least 19 people.
articles.content: NYSA, Poland, Sept 17 (Reuters) - Volunteers shored up defences to stem swollen rivers in the Polish city of Nysa on Tuesday, one of dozens of towns and cities across central Europe deluged by devast… [+4222 chars]
